item.title: Machining with the Big Lathe
item.description: A large-scale machining job calls for the big lathe — watch the process of shaping and finishing heavy metal components with precision.

item.title: Repairing a Deep Crack on a Cylinder
item.description: A damaged hydraulic cylinder undergoes a full replacement and repair process to ensure lasting strength and reliability.

item.title: Making New Pins for a CAT Scraper
item.description: New pins are precision-machined for a CAT scraper, restoring proper fit and performance to the heavy equipment.

item.title: Replacing Severely Worn Pistons
item.description: These damaged pistons are beyond repair — watch how the team safely removes and replaces them to restore engine performance.

item.title: Machining CAT 24M Grader Accumulators
item.description: With replacement parts unavailable, these seized CAT 24M grader accumulators are carefully machined on the lathe to restore functionality.

item.title: Helping a Customer Save Thousands
item.description: Smart repairs and expert craftsmanship helped this customer avoid costly replacements — proof that precision pays off

item.title: Machining a Cylinder Rod for Mining Excavator
item.description: Watch the process of machining a massive cylinder rod built to handle the toughest mining conditions.

item.title: Repairing a $20K Cylinder Rod
item.description: A damaged $20,000 cylinder rod gets a full restoration with expert machining and welding. A big save for heavy equipment.

item.title: New Cylinder Rod for 90T Excavator
item.description: See how a brand-new cylinder rod is fitted for a 90-ton excavator — precision work that keeps heavy machinery moving.

item.title: CAT Engine Crank Pulley Repair
item.description: Watch the precision and skill behind restoring a CAT engine crank pulley — a perfect blend of machining and engineering expertise.

item.title: Still Searching for the Missing Piece
item.description: The repair continues as the team works to solve a tricky mechanical issue that refuses to give in. #reels #workshop #tools #repairing #mechanics #machines

item.title: Repairing a Damaged 30T Excavator Bucket
item.description: A look at how a heavily damaged excavator bucket is repaired and restored for heavy-duty work.

item.description: After a detailed machining process, the upgraded part is ready for its final test — here’s how it performs.

item.title: Machining a Komatsu Rod Step by Step
item.description: Watch the careful process of machining the piston off a Komatsu rod — precision, patience, and engineering in action.

item.title: Dealing with a Stuck Cylinder During Setup
item.description: While setting up our new spray system, one of the large cylinders proves hard to move — here’s how we troubleshoot the issue safely and efficiently.

item.description: We unbox a new metal spray setup and walk through the first test run, checking its performance and setup process in detail.

item.title: Boom Extension Cylinder Teardown
item.description: The teardown process reveals how a boom extension cylinder is inspected and repaired.

item.description: Watch a full restoration as a damaged forklift cylinder is rebuilt and tested.

item.description: A detailed look at smooth machining and solid welding techniques in action.

item.title: Forklift Cylinder Rebuild
item.description: Follow the step-by-step process of rebuilding a forklift cylinder and restoring full performance.
